Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students communicating with each other over a distance.
The student can illustrate a string telephone as the device being used to send and receive information.
The student can use drawings to highlight that the device utilizes sound to communicate.
The student can depict how the design of the string telephone helps solve the problem of communicating over a distance.
The student can demonstrate the specific expected features of the string telephone, such as the cup and string connection.
The student can represent how communication over long distances, illustrated by the string telephone, is useful for people.
